title: Drawing, Design for a Round Table of Mahogany "A" (elevation and plan), 1900–05
title_raw: Design for a Round Table of Mahogany "A" (elevation and plan)
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: In graphite, at cneter of sheet, below the elevation design: "ROUND TABLE/OF MAHOGANY"; in graphite, at lower center of sheet: "PLAN/"A""; in graphite, at upper right and along right edge of elevation design: numerical notations, indicating dimensions.
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: In the upper center of sheet, the elevation of table shows molded top sitting on column-like support raised on flat molded base with knurl feet.  Below, in lower segment of sheet at center, the plan shows round table top raised on molded rectangular base with a circular element at center indicating column-shaped support.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for a Round Table of Mahogany "A" (elevation and plan), 1900–05. Graphite on thin, cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-101
